main.name: Emmanuel Sahr Sewah
main.description: I plan, design and build secure software Systems that works across all platforms.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Emmanuel Sahr Sewah! I've been into Software Development for over 3+ years now. As a Software Developer. I've worked as a fullstack software developer, IT Associate, and Systems Support Engineer with startups, Government Organiations and Private entities to help build & scale their Applications / companies. I possess strong understanding of various software Development priciples and best practices couple with indept practical experiences in Information Technology. I have a passion for processes, and I am an experienced team leader / player who typically manages and work with upto 10 developers/engineers at any given time
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to benefit from my wide range of skills and experience

resume.skillmessage: My Information Technology (IT) Proficiency and skills include but not limited to the following:

education.school: Specialised Institute of Applied Technology (ISTA-NTIC) - Rabat

work.title: Founder / Fullstack Software Developer
work.description: Manage the planning, designs and development of Software Applications and Websites for Clients. I manage projects for small and medium size business and ensure timely delivery of their  business applications and help them increase sales and productivity.

work.company: M & H Technology Services S.A.R.L - RABAT
work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Developed an interactive application using React and Firebase that allows users to log in, make a post, comment on post, edit profile, etc. I also worked with a two men team to build a full stack desktop application using Microsoft DotNet and SQLi that allows users to manage stocks. I worked with the Liberian Students Association in Morocco (LISAM) and build their official website www.lisamlisam.org that makes it very easy for students to acess information, news events and allowances status

skills.name: Computer Programming and Coding (Java, Javascript, SQL, HTML, CSS)
Practical Knowledge of Key DevOps Tools (Git, Docker, Kubernetes)

projects.title: Liberian Students Assocation in Morocco Website (React JS & Firebase)
Employee Management System (React.js, Java SpringBoot & Postgres SQL)

testimonials.text: Emmanuel is a very intelligent young man. He delivers quality and professionalism to every task assigned him. I definedly recommend him and trust in his abilities.
testimonials.user: Alphonso Zean Soe, CEO- Liberia Public Radio

testimonials.text: Working with Emmanuel to build our Association (Liberian Students Association in Morocco) Official Website was the best experience of my life. He made everything easy. He understands how to convert ideas and thoughts into reality. Emmanuel pays attention to details and I definitely recommend him.
